name: Headology - easily see what's in pages' heads.
description: It puts a small gray "button" in topright corner of the viewport (the place where page is displayed). After hovering on it, a popup appears, ahowing some info about page head (meta tags etc).
additional_info:
You can use it in any way you like, for any legal purpose, for free,  no need to attribution, etc. If you like more formal terms, it's licensed on CC-0 (Creative Commons, zero, it's a kind of European public domain ;) )

It does a weird thing to iframes, I don't know how to fix it.
